scripts.install:all: npm install && cd Notes_App/backend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.build: cd Notes_App/frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build && cd ../../ && mkdir -p Notes_App/backend/public && cp -r Notes_App/frontend/dist/* Notes_App/backend/public/
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd Notes_App/backend && npm run dev" "cd Notes_App/frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.render-build: npm install && cd Notes_App/backend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build && cd ../../ && mkdir -p Notes_App/backend/public && cp -r Notes_App/frontend/dist/* Notes_App/backend/public/
